description: A Lebanese-bread base makes this smoky, spicy prawn pizza a breeze for weeknight dining.
name: Chipotle Prawn Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g medium uncooked prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place bread on trays.
Spread bread with sauce, then top with half the cheese and half the spring onion. Top with prawns, then remaining cheese. Season.
Bake pizzas for 20 minutes or until golden brown and bases are crispy.
Sprinkle with remaining spring onion. Drizzle with half the mayonnaise. Serve with remaining mayonnaise.
